meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one quintillion hertz.
meanings.sent1: An exahertz is a very high frequency measurement.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use exahertz to describe extremely fast frequencies.
meanings.sent3: The exahertz frequency was so fast that even the computers couldn't keep up!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room at an exahertz pace.
meanings.sent5: The exahertz signal was like a rapid heartbeat, pulsing with energy.

meanings.definition: A frequency of one quintillion hertz.
meanings.sent1: The exahertz frequency is beyond our normal range of hearing.
meanings.sent2: Devices can operate at speeds measured in exahertz.
meanings.sent3: The exahertz waves were so fast, they made the snail look speedy!
meanings.sent4: The information traveled through the network at an exahertz speed.
meanings.sent5: The exahertz frequency hummed like a swarm of bees, buzzing with activity.
